H0.text: Driving a longer route is the action that would most likely reduce air pollution caused by cars.

H1.text: Purchasing a larger car would most likely reduce air pollution caused by cars.

H2.text: Taking fewer car trips is the action that would most likely reduce air pollution caused by cars.

H3.text: Using smaller tires is the action that would most likely reduce air pollution caused by cars.

A4.text: Reducing motor vehicle travel can curb pollution.

A5.text: Motor traffic can be reduced by creating more walkable cities and by investing in cycling infrastructure.
